column1: She testified that the properties were  given  to  her as she had the
responsibility  of  looking  after  one  of  her  brother's  who  was  mentally
retarded  and  did  not have  the  capacity  to  look  after himself.  PWI  has
employed  a  person to look after him and is maintaining their ancestral
house where  the  sick  brother was  being looked  after  from  the  income
she receives from  the lands that were gifted by her father.
